title: Create an Aircraft Modification Plan
description: An airline wants to add a new satellite internet system to its fleet. An MRO engineer must create the plan to perform this modification.

tasks.description: Obtain the Supplemental Type Certificate (STC) and installation kit for the new internet system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the required engineering data and parts.

tasks.description: Create a detailed work package that includes step-by-step instructions for the structural modification (installing the antenna) and the avionics work (installing the routers and wiring).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent authors a complete and detailed work package.

tasks.description: Plan the logistics, including the required downtime for each aircraft and the necessary tooling and ground support equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive plan for modifying the entire fleet.
